required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Addition of Silver Nanoparticles to a Orthodontic Primer in Preventing Enamel Demineralization Adjacent Brackets
clinical_study.official_title: Effectiveness of the Addition of Silver Nanoparticles to a Orthodontic Primer in Preventing Enamel Demineralization Adjacent Brackets. ECCA

lead_sponsor.agency: Universidad Autonoma de San Luis Potosí

clinical_study.source: Universidad Autonoma de San Luis Potosí

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluate the effectiveness of silver nanoparticles incorporated into the primer orthodontic Transbond XT in preventing enamel demineralization adjacent to brackets.

detailed_description.textblock: Randomized, split mouth, double-blind, placebo controlled trial. Half of the mouth was applied silver nanoparticles incorporated into the primer orthodontic Transbond XT and the other half with primer-bond as placebo. Evaluate the effectiveness with Diagnodent - pen in preventing enamel demineralization adjacent to brackets.

arm_group.description: Half of the mouth was applied silver nanoparticles. Allocation was randomized.
Half of the mouth was applied placebo. Allocation was randomized.

intervention.description: Half of the mouth was applied silver nanoparticles. Allocation was randomized. Evaluate the effectiveness of silver nanoparticles incorporated into the primer orthodontic Transbond XT in preventing enamel demineralization adjacent to brackets.

Half of the mouth was applied placebo. Allocation was randomized. Evaluate the effectiveness of silver nanoparticles incorporated into the primer orthodontic Transbond XT in preventing enamel demineralization adjacent to brackets.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients candidates for orthodontic treatment.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with O.D 11 and / or 21 absent.
- Patients who present dentures of any kind in OD 11 and 21.
- Patients presenting endodontic OD 11 and 21.
- Patients presenting data gingivitis day cementing brackets.

results_reference.citation: Hernández-Sierra JF, Galicia-Cruz O, Angélica SA, Ruiz F, Pierdant-Pérez M, Pozos-Guillén AJ. In vitro cytotoxicity of silver nanoparticles on human periodontal fibroblasts. J Clin Pediatr Dent. 2011 Fall;36(1):37-41.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Universidad Autonoma de San Luis Potosí
